encounters.name: {0} gets startled by a crazed wizard who teleports into their camp. He begins to rave about his newest creation of {1} beer, he forces a bottle into {0} hand before teleporting away. Interested {0} takes a drink, it reminds {0} of their childhood.
{0} came across a fallen tree in the road, unbeknownst to {0} a group of {1}s was waiting in the nearby trees. The {1}s jumped the unaware {0} knocking them unconscious and stealing their coin.
